text: Agim Nuhiu (born 1977) was Interior Minister of Macedonia.МИНИСТЕР ЗА ВНАТРЕШНИ РАБОТИ НА РЕПУБЛИКА МАКЕДОНИЈА. Retrieved 20 January 2017 (Macedonian) He was the first ethnic Albanian from Macedonia to hold this position in the government since Macedonia's independence from Yugoslavia in 1991.Агим Нухиу и официјално прв Албанец на чело на МВР 29.12.2016. Retrieved 20 January 2017 (Macedonian) ==References== Category:People from Tetovo Category:1977 births Category:Living people
title: Agim Nuhiu
